resources.string: Copyright Â© 2012, 2014 FRUCT Lab in IT-park of Petrozavodsk State University. Main developer is Artemov Nikita. Android port by Kirill Ivashov.

Explode Them is arcade game. On the area scattered bombs of different sizes. By clicking on the bomb you're spending a spark increase in the amount of it. After reaching a certain size, it explodes in the scattered sparks of which interact with the other bombs. The number of sparks is limited. You get a new spark after the end of each level, or after the fifth explosion. The main goal of the game to explode as many bombs until spark did not end.

Explode Them is arcade game. On the area scattered bombs of different sizes. By clicking on the bomb you're spending a spark increase in the amount of it. After reaching a certain size, it explodes in the scattered sparks of which interact with the other bombs. The number of sparks is limited. You get a new spark after the end of each level, or after the fifth explosion. The main goal of the game to explode as many bombs until spark did not end. Features of full version: - 3 level of difficult; - shake effect; - water bombs.

string-array.name: help_strings
string-array.item: When you push the bomb you will spend a spark. If no sparks are available then game is over.
If the bomb acquires a red color then next push will cause explosion. You can\'t push the bomb until reaction doesn\'t stop
You get one spark after every fifth bomb explosion and at the end of level
The main goal is to explode as many bombs as possible using the least amount of sparks
At at game start you have three shakes. Shake the phone and all red bombs will explode.
